scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../phonebook-frontend/ && npm run build --prod && mv build ../phonebook-backend/
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook-backend heroku master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && cd ../../ && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook-backend heroku master
